title: The Persimmon Sisters feat. Tennille Read
dc:creator: WBUR
description: In this story with Jewish, Arab, and Korean origins, Tennille Read (SurrealEstate, Workin' Moms) plays a young woman who learns the true meaning of sisterly love.
